sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-app-bar app class="light-blue lighten-2">
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>

      <v-toolbar-title>MyTodoList</v-toolbar-title>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-navigation-drawer
        theme="dark"
        v-model="drawer"
        app
      >

        <v-btn class="pa-2">
          <svg-icon type="mdi" :path="path1"></svg-icon>
          <router-link to="/todolist">Todo-List</router-link>
        </v-btn>
        <v-btn class="pa-2">
          <svg-icon type="mdi" :path="path2"></svg-icon>
          <router-link to="/todolist">Archive</router-link>
        </v-btn>
        <v-list nav>
          <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-email" title="Inbox" value="inbox">
            <v-icon icon="fa:fas fa-edit"></v-icon>
            <router-link to="/todolist">Todo List</router-link>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-account-supervisor-circle" title="Supervisors" value="supervisors">
            <svg-icon type="mdi" :path="path2"></svg-icon>
            <router-link to="/about">Archive</router-link>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-clock-start" title="Clock-in" value="clockin">
            <v-icon></v-icon>
            <router-link to="/albo">Albo</router-link>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-clock-start" title="Clock-in" value="clockin">
            <v-icon></v-icon>
            <router-link to="/">Logout</router-link>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>

    <v-main app>
      <v-container fluid>
        <router-view></router-view>
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import SvgIcon from '@jamescoyle/vue-icon';
import { mdiFormatListCheckbox } from '@mdi/js';
import { mdiArchiveOutline } from '@mdi/js';

// Todo:
// - adjust side menu and add items
// - make todos work with vuetify (edit, delete, archive buttons as well)
// - make side menu disapper on login page

  export default {
    name: "App",
    components: {
      SvgIcon
    },
    data: () => ({ 
      drawer: null,
      path1: mdiFormatListCheckbox, 
      path2: mdiArchiveOutline,
      path3: "",
      path4: "",
    }),

  };
</script>

        <router-link to="/">Todo List</router-link> |
        <router-link to="/about">Archive</router-link>
        <router-link to="/albo">Albo</router-link>
        <router-link to="/login">Login</router-link>
      </nav>
      <router-view/>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>

  name: 'App',
  components: {
    //NavBar
  },
  data: () => ({
